code: import React from'react';import{Star}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StarRating=_ref=>{let{rating,maxRating=5,size='sm'}=_ref;const sizeClasses={sm:'w-4 h-4',md:'w-5 h-5',lg:'w-6 h-6'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-1",children:[...Array(maxRating)].map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Star,{className:"".concat(sizeClasses[size]," ").concat(index<rating?'text-yellow-400 fill-current':'text-gray-300')},index))});};export default StarRating;
